|wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325MA2;BCM5325MA2KQM, HG0741 P12, 841992 1; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 2.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Motorola |default_ssid_regex=^Motorola$ |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=motorola |oui=00:1C:11 |oui_eth=00:15:2F }} [http://www.motorola.com/web/Business/Products/Modems%20and%20Gateways/Gateways/Wireless%20Cable%20Modem%20Gateways/SBG940/_Documents/Static%20Files/521987-001_SBG940%20User%20Guide_English.pdf Manual]
"P/N: 519017-001-00", "MODEL: SBG940", "REV: A", "2004.09.22", and "PSD 15.2" is silkscreened on the board of one SBG940. :"WLC211G-B", "141021120003B", "REV: R0A", "2003.11.17" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos. :"DPSN-98P" is silkscreened on the internal '''Delta Electronics''' power supply.
This unit would appear to have been manufactured by '''Mototech''', <small>which is now '''Metalligence'''</small>.
Default settings are from the manual. The default IP may be 192.168.100.1 or 192.168.0.1.
Additional models of SBG940i and SBG940E
==Noted units== *P/N: '''509675-001-00''' - FCC ID: ACQSBG940-1, WiOUI: 00:1C:11, EthOUI: 00:15:2F, CoO: China
